airAir - Static variable in class Gameplay.Value
airAir - static int - A clear air tile that means nothing is stored on that tile other than the ground tile.
airBasophil - Static variable in class Gameplay.Value
The is the basophil white blood cell tower air tile ID.
airBCell - Static variable in class Gameplay.Value
The is the B Cell white blood cell tower air tile ID.
airEosinophil - Static variable in class Gameplay.Value
The is the eosinophil white blood cell tower air tile ID.
airFinish - Static variable in class Gameplay.Value
airFinish - static int - A finish rainbow-like air tile that the enemy disappears on but also takes away your health points.
airFinishHeart - Static variable in class Gameplay.Value
The is the air tile TD heart where pathogens disappear but decrease one of your health points.
airGarbageBin - Static variable in class Gameplay.Value
airGarbageBin - static int - A garbage bin icon in the store that is used for deselecting purposes.
airID - Variable in class Gameplay.Block
airID - int variable storing the air tile's ID.
airID - Variable in class Gameplay.Tower
airID - int storing the value of the air ID.
airLaserTower - Static variable in class Gameplay.Value
The purple tower air tile ID that is a basic tower shooting one laser at enemies dealing moderate damage.
airNaturalK - Static variable in class Gameplay.Value
The is the natural killer white blood cell tower air tile ID.
airNeutrophil - Static variable in class Gameplay.Value
The is the neutrophil white blood cell tower air tile ID.
airTCell - Static variable in class Gameplay.Value
The is the T Cell white blood cell tower air tile ID.
answer - Variable in class Gameplay.QuizScreen
answer - String variable storing the true or false answer from the text file.
awayFromRoom - Static variable in class Gameplay.Store
awayFromRoom - static int of the space separating between the game tile play board and the shop buttons.
